articles.title: Meta Ordered By Italian Regulators To Keep WhatsApp Open For Rival AI Chatbots
articles.mainIdea: Meta Ordered By Italian Regulators To Keep WhatsApp Open For Rival AI Chatbots
articles.summary: Investor's Business Daily: Meta Ordered By Italian Regulators To Keep WhatsApp Open For Rival AI Chatbots. Italian regulators ordered Meta Platforms to keep its WhatsApp messaging platform open to rival chatbots, such as OpenAI's ChatGPT. Meta stock gained a fraction during a shortened trading day. The Italian Competition Authority said Wednesday that a policy change within WhatsApp will "completely exclude Meta AI's competitors" from the platform, once it takes effect Jan. 15. Related tickers mentioned: MSFT, OPAI.PVT, PEAI.PVT.

articles.title: Italy tells Meta to suspend its policy that bans rival AI chatbots from WhatsApp
articles.mainIdea: Italy tells Meta to suspend its policy that bans rival AI chatbots from WhatsApp
articles.summary: TechCrunch: Italy tells Meta to suspend its policy that bans rival AI chatbots from WhatsApp. Italy has ordered Meta to suspend its policy that bans companies from using WhatsApp's business tools to offer their own AI chatbots on the popular chat app.

articles.title: Italy watchdog orders Meta to halt WhatsApp terms barring rival AI chatbots
articles.mainIdea: Italy watchdog orders Meta to halt WhatsApp terms barring rival AI chatbots
articles.summary: Reuters: Italy watchdog orders Meta to halt WhatsApp terms barring rival AI chatbots. Italy's antitrust authority (AGCM) on Wednesday ordered Meta Platforms to suspend contractual terms that could ​shut rival AI chatbots out of WhatsApp, as it investigates ‌the U.S. tech group for suspected abuse of a dominant position. A spokesperson for ‌Meta called the decision "fundamentally flawed," and said the emergence of AI chatbots "put a strain on our systems that they were not designed to support".
